name: Chain Reaction (itch) (MichaelBer)
description:
Harness the power of the atom! Pilot neutrons the the reactor core to successfully facilitate nuclear fission! But be careful, too many reactions can spiral the reactor out of control!

In this game you operate a nuclear reactor by piloting neutrons, managing control rods and pumping in cool water. This was made for the GMTK 2020 game jam. The theme was "Out of Control".
